creditline: Gift of the Alfred K. Moir Trust
description: abstracted image of a horse with legs upraised; small, sketchy head; large, ovoid body
provenance: the artist, New Orleans ('before 1962; gave/sold to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1962-d. 2010; bequeathed to Condos); Barbara Moir Condos, Chevy Chase, Maryland (2010-12)
title: Study of a Jumping Horse
